Name: Block_Quotes
Upper West Side: ['The Upper West Side is decorated with well-kept tree-lined streets with one brownstone after another, breathtaking old world architecture and pre-war buildings, and, not to mention, countless celebrity sightings, including Matt Damon, Tina Fey, Alec Baldwin, Howard Stern, and Kevin Bacon.', 'The neighborhood is perfect for a NYC stay and we immediately felt like locals.', 'Within 5-10 minutes of walking there are multiple ponds, lakes, waterfalls and woodsy trails... and you are still in the heart of Manhattan! Yes.\r \r This is a great family neighborhood. Lots of restaurants, multiple subway lines and all that good stuff.']

Name: Lede
Upper West Side: The Upper West Side is filled with beautifully maintained brownstones and portrait-above-the-mantle worthy families. Its impeccable appearance comes at a cost, and this neighborhoods high price tags may dissuade some from taking a closer look. Suspend disbelief about the number of zeroes on your bill and you'll be glad you didthe Upper West Side's Central Park proximity and surprisingly relaxed brunch spots merit more than a second glance.

Name: Intro
Upper West Side: Architecturally appealing churches and brownstones beg visitors to take a closer look at this well-mannered neighborhood.

Name: Photo_Captions
Upper West Side: ['Immaculate brownstones and impeccable storefronts lend this stately neighborhood a surprisingly village-like vibe.', 'Well-manicured parks, well-groomed dogs, and well-dressed families populate the sleek sidewalks of the Upper West Side.', "The Upper West Side's transparent cafes and open benches are perfect perches for sidewalk people-watching.", "The Julliard School is one of the world's premier schools for the arts.", "The Lincoln Center is New York City's home for the performing arts.", "Columbus Circle's iconic CNN tower shines over the city.", 'Enjoy the grassy pastures of two parks in the Upper West Side.', 'The neighborhood nestles between Central Park and Riverside Park.', 'What a lovely day for a walk.']
